CustomField.description: - Active if the system date is equal to or later than the Start Date and equal to or earlier than the End Date. - Expired if the system date is later than the End Date. - Inactive if the system date is earlier than the Start Date.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND(TODAY() >= StartDate, TODAY()<= EndDate),'Active', IF(TODAY() > EndDate,'Expired', IF(TODAY() < StartDate,'Inactive', 'Inactive' )))
CustomField.label: CH Service Contract Status
